description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Loads of fun for everyone! Group snake eyes of one color to burst them and prevent them from reaching the snake's head! Create chain reactions for huge points and to charge your slow-timer which can be activated to slow the advancing balls briefly. Play with a friend in two player co-op, and compare your high scores with everyone in the world! (Gold account required for global high score chart).
